ygData.subject: RE: RE: Any one Know where Lord Grimlot in Neriak Is?
ygData.msgSnippet: The last time I saw Lord Grimlot he was walking south on the Stone Bridge in SK - presuambly collecting tolls from travelers?  I guess I did not have exact
ygData.messageBody:
The last time I saw Lord Grimlot he was walking south on the Stone Bridge in
SK - presuambly collecting tolls from travelers? I guess I did not have
exact change and angered him. He attacked me as soon as he saw me and in his
full steel plate - I decided to make a run for it and crossed into NK and
the safety of the bridge guards.

If you are thinking of having a conversation with him, I suggest you con him
from a distance and get your race/religion/faction aligned so that he is
indifferent or amiable to you.

Sylly.

-----Original Message-----
From: GooDFeLLa [mailto:goodfella@...]
Sent: Wednesday, August 25, 1999 7:57 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] RE: Any one Know where Lord
Grimlot in Neriak Is?

From: "GooDFeLLa" <goodfella@...>

I know This has been gone over before, but I must of deleted
the email by
accident. Pls can someone help me with finding Lord Grimlot
in Neriak? I'm
tryin to complete the lute of the gypsy quest to see what it
gives you.

Thanks!
Chancez
